So you continued to walk down the aisle where a fairy priest and a male fairy in fancy garb stood at the alter. The handsome prince is waiting for you. Can't keep him waiting. You felt compelled to keep walking, but you were still wondering what was going on. You couldn't quite figure it out, it was like something was blocking your normal thought patterns.

You finally reach the alter and the fairy priest begins talking. You aren't really paying attention, you just feel compelled to look into the eyes of the charming and handsome prince. You give yourself a mental slap, Snap out of it, what the hell is wrong with you. But that was as far as you went because the fairy priest ended the marriage ceremony, and pronounced you King and Queen of the fairies. The prince leaned in and gave you a kiss.

It was this that finally snapped you out of the tiara's control. You pull away and say, "Enough! I'm through with this!" You look at the prince who seems concerned so you say, "Look pal, I guess you're an employee here or something, and you do a good job but this isn't for me." You reach up to take the mind influencing tiara off of your head when the prince grabs your arms to stop you.

"Wait!" He says, "I haven't been honest with you. Normally they would have an computer generated fairy here like the audience and priest, but I stepped in because you're special and I wanted to be here in this place with you." The fair who you had just had a marriage ceremony with then makes a confession.
111132211121111111212111122.title: A handsome fairy prince waiting for you

choices: You escape and get help from the girls
You decide to stay
1111322111211111112121111222.content:
The prince led you to a thrown and sat you down in it. You were ready to just run away, but you felt compelled to hear what this guy had to say. He began his tale, "You see my love, long before the humans colonized this planet in this sector of space, this planet was the fairy home world, but then the humans came and colonized this world with their technology and big feet. Our people stood no chance so we have hidden away for generations awaiting the fulfillment of the prophecy. The prophecy that said a young, beautiful, fairy princess would arrive and marry the prince. That's me. And our union would unite the two races." That's so beautiful. I'm saving the world. The voice from the tiara said in your mind. You had to admit it was a nice fairy tale story, but you didn't want to have a staring role. But the prince wasn't done talking yet. "Then once our two races were united, the fairy's will crush the humans and take control of the universe!"

So beautiful, I can't wait. The tiara thought. You did not feel the same way at all. You weren't going to help this psychotic fairy take over humanity. "I think you've got the wrong idea. I just came here with my friends to have a fun time. I'll just be leaving now."

"Nay, you must not leave. You are the chosen one. You were selected by the royal dress and you come in wearing the fairy queen's tiara which has not been seen by fairy eyes in years."

"Oh this old thing? I just picked the first dress on the rack that fit, and I didn't even pick this stupid tiara. That worker girl, Bella, just gave it to me because I didn't know how to fly. I'm sure plenty of little girls have worn this stuff." You say all this while slowly backing away to the door.

The prince then went on another long winded rant about 'destiny' and 'world domination' and a bunch of other stuff you weren't paying attention to. He was off in his own world and you knew it, so you took the opportunity to use your wings and fly as fast as you could towards the exit. All you had to do was open the door and go get help from Jamie and the girls. These stupid fairy people wouldn't stand a chance against them. But when you reach the door and turn the knob to escape you feel very loudly in your head, Why would you ever want to leave? You are having a life of power and royalty laid before you. Would you really just walk away from greatness for your normal and boring life? You feel ashamed as you actually hesitate to consider the offer.
1111322111211111112121111222.title: That was a real prince who you really married

choices: Next week you go on a new outing with the girls
The tiara won't come off and won't let you change back
11113221112111111121211112221.content:
You shake your head to knock those stupid tiara created thoughts from your head and open the door. You shoot through the door at an amazing speed, shoot through the dressing area, and out into the lobby where the girls were waiting on you. "Oh, finished already?" Chelsea asks, but when they see how rattled you are Rachel asks, "What's wrong?"

You take a few deep breaths and relay the story of what just happened with the prince, the wedding, the tiara, and the plot of world domination. You were expecting the girls to be merely annoyed. Paulina looked especially frustrated, "I'm sorry about that, I thought we took care of that when we brought in the exterminator last month. The problem with having a fairy themed store is that you'll get the occasion infestation of actual fairies." Before you could ask more probing questions, you felt a tug at your arm. The prince and some fairy solders had followed you through the door and were trying to take you back.

"We will have our queen and we will rule over you all!" The prince shouted at the girls who towered over him. This was not a smart move as Beth and Jamie moved forward and squashed them all with no problem. You were expecting to be mortified with blood, guts, and gore, but instead there were mini beautiful explosions of sparkles and dust. "They're worse than mosquitoes." You hear Violet mumble under her breath.

"Jamie bent down until she was nearly eye level with you and said, "I'm sorry about all that. I promise, next time we go out you'll have a much better time."

"No psychotic small people trying to kidnap me to take over the world?" You say feeling better now that you knew you were safe.

"We'll see." Jamie says with a smile and you get a good laugh out of that. Paulina walked up to you and said, "Come on, let's get you out of that fairy princess stuff and get you home, we'll try something different next week."
11113221112111111121211112221.title: You escape and get help from the girls

choices: It's the Amature Robot Fighting League Tryouts
It's a Limbless Carnival
111132211121111111212111122211.content:
The fairy experience thing didn't go as well as the girls had hoped, so they promised you that next week they'd try something different. In fact Beth insisted that she knew the perfect thing for you to try out. You didn't ask any further questions, you just wanted to get back to a normal size and back to being Michel as soon as you could. And a few hours later you thankfully were.

A week later it was once again time for your mothers extended outing with her book club and you were left another clothing package by your sister. This time she'd left you a spaghetti strap baby blue top and some black short shorts along with the now familiar bra and panties. You injected yourself in the neck, put on the clothes, and another shrink ray blast and hiding in a bag of Beth's spare limbs you had covertly smuggled out of the house as Mika.

After the car trip, you were let out and grown back to a more normal height. As soon as you got your barrings you took a look around and it seemed that the girls had taken you to an arena of some sort. "What's going on here?" You ask, you knew that this arena was usually home to either big sporting events or the occasional festival of sorts. Beth was the person to answer you, "I thought you might like to watch or maybe even participate in one of my all time favorite things." Beth by far seemed to be the most excited. Everyone else didn't seem to love being there, but were at least being polite and weren't complaining. You looked at all the girls faces one by one and sure enough Jamie, Rachel, Paulina, Chelsea, and Violet all seemed to be off talking to each other in their own separate huddle. You tried to get closer to them but Beth put her currently masculine arms around your shoulder and started to lead you to the arena.

You were about to ask Beth what she was taking you to, but you saw a sign at the front door that told you all you needed to know about the event that was taking place.
111132211121111111212111122211.title: Next week you go on a new outing with the girls

choices: "Looks like we're up. You can watch me fight from the crew area." Beth says.
"Alright, now we'll get to see some action!" Beth says excitedly.
1111322111211111112121111222111.content:
"Amateur Robot fighting league? Seriously?" you excitedly exclaimed upon reading the sign, as both robotic engineering and gladiatorial sporting events were both interests of yours, not that you'd ever done either of them yourself, but you did like to learn about them and watch programs about them whenever possible.

"Yep. I've been competing in the local division for three years running now. Last year I even made it into the semifinals." Beth answered proudly.

"You're a robot jock? Wow, I'm impressed!" you replied, looking at your sisters friend with new found respect, as few people your age have the necessary skills to interface properly with a fighting robot.

"We prefer to be called pilots, but yea. You seem more interested in this than the other girls, how would you like to get a look at a fighting robot up close and personal?" Beth asks.

"Would I?! You bet! Robot fighting is my favorite sport!" you eagerly replied.

"Well, than what are we waiting for? Come on, we've only got a little while to prepare before the firsts matches start!" Beth said, grabbing your wrist in her powerful grip and running off towards the pits, forcing you run after her or risk being dragged.

Entering the holding area, you follow Beth leads you through a flurry of activity until the two of you arrived in front of a bay where a couple of guys, one appearing to be in his early thirties, the other a couple of years older you and Beth were working on a six foot tall humanoid robot covered in black armored plates. Vaguely feminine in appearance, the black robot seems smaller and more slender than most of it's competitors, most of whom were hulking masses of metal seven feet or more in height.

Gesturing grandly, Beth proudly says "Mika, Allow me to introduce the black beauty, the best fighting robot in the amateur circuit. I should know, I designed and built it myself."

"Ahem!" the older man says, giving Beth a pointed look.

"Ah, with my dad and my brothers help of course." Beth added quickly.

"Better." the older man says, nodding his head. "So Beth, who's your friend?" he asks.

Placing one arm around your shoulders and pulling you forward, Beth introduces you. "Dad, meet Mika, Rachel's cousin from out of town. Mika, this is my dad Mark. The other goober over there is my older brother Vance. Try not to talk to him, he's a perverted jerk and will try to get into your pants if you give him the opportunity."

"Hey!" the younger man complains, obviously offended by his sisters remark.

"Now kids, play nice, we still have to finish going over the checklist before the matches start. Wouldn't do to have to forfeit over some minor malfunction just because we didn't do a proper maintenance check, especially after all the hard work we put in to get here." Mark said.

"Righto pops, just help me into the control rig and we can get started." Beth agreed, moving over towards a a complicated looking contraption, consisting of a partially enclosed upright chair of sorts with a couple of monitors, a restraint harness, and a bunch of wires and cables coming out of it. All in all, you weren't sure whether the thing reminded you more of a fighter cockpit, a dentists chair, or a coffin.

Beth climbs into the control rig, the two men quickly removing her limbs and inserting various cables into the resulting slots then inserting a final cable in a port at the base of her neck.

"So what's the deal with all this? I always thought all you needed to control a fighting robot was a couple of joysticks and a few buttons." You asked curiously.

"Well sure, if you just want the bot to stand there and hit things. To be honest, that's all that most people think this is, at least at this level. If you want to be able to dodge around and perform complicated moves though, you need to be the robot, the more confections you have the better. And since my limbs are detachable anyway, I figured, why not take advantage of that to give myself an edge?" Beth explained.

"Yea, I guess that makes sense. You'll need whatever edge you can get what with your robot being so much smaller and lighter than all the others." you replied.

"Hey! There's nothing wrong with my design! Size isn't everything you know. My bot may be smaller, but she's also faster and more agile, and with my special control rig, I can avoid a lot of hits that those other bots can't." Beth explained.

"Okay, I guess that makes sense, but isn't having such light armor a problem whenever you do get hit? It doesn't look like it could stand up to much." you pointed out.

"That's what we want people to think. I know the armor looks like carbon fiber, but that's actually only a thin outer layer. The real armor is titanium plate interwoven with synthetic diamond filaments and backed by a layer of impact absorbing gel. Just keep that to yourself though, we don't want our competition finding out our secret." Beth's dad says with a wink.

"Okay, I guess that's pretty good, but what about offense? Those fists could probably kill a human easy, but they don't look like they'd do much against those bruisers." you said, pointing back over your shoulder at the competition.

"Their a lot more powerful than you'd think." Vance replied. "The trick is that we've included a couple of inertial dampers from an old sky car. Thing is, we've set them to work in reverse, and rigged them to trigger right at the point of impact, making every punch almost twice as powerful as it otherwise would be."

"Wow, you guys have really put a lot of thought into this haven't you?" you said, more than a little impressed by Beth and her family's engineering skills.

"That, plus a lot of hard work, and more money than I care to think about, but it'll all be worth it to see that trophy sitting on out mantel piece." Mark says.

"Plus the fifty thousand credit cash prize doesn't hurt either aye dad?" Vance added, nudging him with his elbow.

"Well, the thought had crossed my mind. It would be nice to get at least some of my investment back after all." Mark replied.

You turn back towards Beth, who's busy putting the bot through it's paces. "So there's money in this huh? I didn't know they gave out prizes at the amateur level. I thought people just did this for fun.

"Most people do, you only get paid if you manage to become grand champion, and good luck with that, because there's a lot of stiff competition. Why else do you think as good as our design is, that we've only ever gotten to the semifinals?" Beth answered distractedly, while putting the black beauty through a complicated series of punches kicks, blocks and dodges while watching her indicators for any signs of a problem.

Suddenly a buzzer sounds followed by a voice coming over the intercom. "Teams one and eighteen please report to the arena." the voice requests.
1111322111211111112121111222111.title: It's the Amature Robot Fighting League Tryouts

choices: The rest of the tournament goes just as smoothly
Something unexpected happens
11113221112111111121211112221111.content:
"Looks like we're up. Let's do the final bit of integration." Beth said and when she did her dad Mark and brother Vance went up Beth's station and closed the monitors and casing around her completing the coffin look. You had a sinking feeling in the pit of his stomach until you felt a hard pat on his shoulder. You turned and saw that it was Black Beauty, only now it seemed fully operational with it's 'face' now lighting up. A robotic voice resembling Beth's came from a speaker in it's chest that said, "It's okay, it's just me. I had to compete the consciousness integration."

"So you really are Black Beauty now?" You ask your friend.

"I'm still in that control panel. It just seems like I'm the robot now, even from my perspective. I feel like I'm moving around and speaking to you from Black Beauty's perspective, and for all intensive purposes I am, but I'm not." You were confused and it was showing.

Vance smiled at you and said, "You see Mika, just think about it like Beth really is the robot now. But she can stop at any time. And even if something bad happens like heaven forbid a power failure on our end or she screws up and gets her head knocked off she will still be 100% A okay"

Mark laughed dryly, "I wouldn't call the stress this process puts on somebody's mind and body leaving them 100% A Okay,"

"Just trying to simplify it pop, didn't want to scare Mika off."

It looked like a three way argument about technical technicalities was about to break out when the intercom buzzed again saying, "I repeat, Teams one and eighteen please report to the arena. Now."

"We'll talk about this later." Beth's robotic voice said as she marched to the arena. Vance passed you an official 'Team Black Beauty' t-shirt that you quickly and excitedly changed into. It seemed Vance had given you a shirt a size too small as it hugged your chest more than you were used to, and showed off a bit of your mid drift. But the match was about to begin and you were too excited to watch an Amateur Robot Fighting League match up close to complain now.

In the first match Beth faced off against a huge 8ft tall silver humanoid bot with a chainsaw hand. You were a little intimidated for Beth, but as soon as the bell sounded you found your fears were misplaced. Beth quickly ran up to the bot and with a series of quick blows to key parts, rendered the arm and then the rest of the bot immobile in seconds.

"One down." You say excitedly as Beth gives the thumbs up to you in the crew area.
11113221112111111121211112221111.title: Watching Beth kick robotic butt

choices: Join Beth and her family as a robot fighting crew member
You'd rather spend your free time with your other friends
111132211121111111212111122211111.content:
"All right, good first round Beth but don't let it get to your head. Vance, run a diagnostic on the match to make sure everything is running as smooth as it should be. I'll reinforce the network connectors to keep Beth and Black Beauty in instantaneous synchronicity and then..." Mark went on to speak a whole lot more technical mumbo jumbo that sounded really impressive but you didn't understand at all. For about 5 minutes you sat meekly on a stool, occasionally trying to pull down the too small team t-shirt you were wearing. Feeling like you if you were going to be here you should at least try to do something to help out Beth and her family. So you grabbed a billion fiber thread sheet, some finishing wax and began to rub at some of the scuffs on Black Beauty.

After rubbing the robot for a few minutes you heard Beth's voice let out a soft moan from the speak in Black Beauty's torso. "Oooooh that feels so good." A little surprised at the tone of Beth's voice you jumped back a little bumping into Vance. After muttering a quick apology to Vance you said to Beth. "Sorry about that. I guess I forgot you were still in there."

"No problem Mika, but you don't have to stop, that felt really good on my muscles...or armor plates I guess is more accurate."

"Oh, well. Okay Beth." You said as you began to rub down the robot with Beth's consciousness...or something inside of it. Michael, this is one of the weirdest things you've ever done. You thought to yourself. Wanting to make some small talk in between Beth's awkward moans you said, "So you can really feel me rubbing you as if I were messaging your body?"

"Kind of, as great as Black Beauty is it's not quite possible to get the same feelings from circuits as actual human nerves. I can feel you but it's almost like I'm a little numb, but don't get me wrong, you're hands feel great. You've got a real talent, you'll have to give me a massage when I get out of here. It's nice that someone in this crew knows how to treat the talent!" Beth said that last part loudly directed at her brother.

Vance smiled, "And it's nice to have someone with a female touch and eye, it's nice to show off our hard work and craftsmanship and it not look like a mess. Just a few minutes of cleaning and Mika here has Black Beauty looking the best she's looking in months." Beth responded to Vance's snark by activating a tesla coil in her finger and giving him a small jolt.

You laugh and then blush a little at the compliment but also groan at being told you had a 'female touch and eye'. As you continued to clean and wallow in being a bit emasculated you heard a voice over the speaker. "Teams 18 and 31, please make your way to the arena."

Mark stepped away form his computer screens to say, "That's us, you better hurry up out there Beth, you know what to do." You saw Black Beauty nod as well as the robotic body could, "Got it dad." And she was off. And once again she made quick work of her bigger and bulkier opponent using speed and precise strikes to take it down. And so that's how the entire day went. Beth would fight, Vance and Mark did techno stuff, and you cleaned. You thought about going back and sitting with Rachel and the girls but you were having so much fun watching the fights up close and even though you weren't doing much you loved being a part of the process of one of your favorite sports.

Finally as the sun began going down, the finals began. Beth was facing off against the biggest and baddest bot she'd fought yet. The fight took a long time going multiple rounds. It looked bad when Beth got her arm cut off by a light sword, but Beth fought back with a hypersonic chainsaw in her leg that she used to scissor kick her opponent's head off and claim the prize. You, Vance, and Mark were ecstatic! Mark was crying tears of joy, Beth was jumping up and down causing the arena to shake, and you and Vance hugged for joy at the team's accomplishment. Then as the day couldn't get much better when the team was awarded the trophy, the family insisted you join them on stage and Beth, still in control of Black Beauty, put you on her shoulders. You could see the your sister and the girls in the audience and while they weren't really into this whole scene, they were obviously very happy for Beth's amazing accomplishment.

As soon as the celebration died down and you were about to leave with Rachel and the others so you could get back home and change back to your nomral Michael self before your parents could find out, Beth called out to you. "Hey Mika, you were great today and I don't know if we could have done it without you. You helped keep moral up, kept me relaxed, and helped Black Beauty look great. Vance came up with this idea, and I love it and I talked to my dad and he loved it to. What we want is, if you want to, you can be a full time part of team Black Beauty. Now that we've won this tournament we can finally go full time with this. Are you in?"

You couldn't believe what you were being offered. This was like a dream come true, to be a part of a crew in your favorite sport. Sure you wished it was Michael getting the offer instead of Mika, but this was better than nothing. Then again if you agree to this all of your free time will be spent as Mika with Beth and her family and the whole reason for becoming Mika in the first place was to hang out with your sister and more importantly your crush Jamie. What should you do?

Going on an exotic cruise
111132211121111112.content:
"Bye mom! Bye dad! Enjoy your two week vacation!" You shouted to your parents as they drove off down the street. As soon as they were out of sight Rachel turned to you and said, "Come on Michel, let's move, we've only got a few minutes."

You oblige and sprint into the house, the second she shuts the door, Rachel takes the sex change nanite injector and sticks you in the back of the neck. As you get out of your clothes and start to change into your Mika stuff (both in clothes and body) you reflect a little bit on the last few months. Over the last few months you'd become good friends with your sister Rachel and her friends. It only took one special sleepover, but you could tell you would be friends with them forever. They were much cooler than your dude friends from school who just talked about growing muscles, enhancing their junk, and their favorite subject, making fun of you because you didn't do either of those things because your parents didn't let you.

But then 6 months ago you'd convinced your sister Rachel to let you come to a sleepover she was having with her friends. Her only condition was you had to be a girl and thus Mika was created. You had so much fun with them doing makeover, playing games, and just being pleasant you would find excuses to change back into Mika to hang out with them for a few hours. You'd gone on miniature and gigantic romps with Paulina, helped Beth pick out some new limbs to try out, gone to the zoo with Violet to find her next weird transformation inspiration, went to watch Chelsea at cheerleader practive (even got roped into doing a routine), and gone shopping for Mika clothes with Rachel.

But your favorite time as Mika had been with Jamie (full name Jasmine but she goes by Jamie). You had a crush on her for years and getting to know her more as a friend made that crush just intensify. Every time you saw her as Mika you'd want to confess who you were and how you felt, but knew that it was a bad idea. And every time you saw her as Michel you would just chicken out and tell yourself it wasn't the right time. But this time would be different. You and the girls were going to go on a two week vacation to some special location. And surely during those two weeks you'd muster up the courage to do something about your crush.

Now that you thought of it, you didn't even know where you were spending the two weeks. You had just been told to prepare for anything. So you packed your bag all the stuff Rachel had picked out for you even if you hadn't tried it on yet including a bikini, a dress, and a parka (hey, they said be ready for anything). You grabbed your bag and looked in the mirror before heading out. You were so glad the nanites in your system had saved the short, big boobed, blonde you from the night of the sleepover. It was much nicer to look at in the mirror than the plain jane you that had originally been made. After admiring yourself in the mirror for a second you heard a car honk and Rachel yelled, "Hurry up! They're here!"

You sprinted out of the house and jumped into the back of the van that Chelsea was driving and said, "Okay I'm here. So spill it, where are we going for the next two weeks?" Chelsea looked back and with a smile on her face revealed the destination.
111132211121111112.title: Getting together with the girls again months later

choices: You manage to make it into the ocean
You aren't able to make it and are beached
1111322111211111121.content:
After about an hour of driving down the road, Chelsea finally turned around and with a wide smile on her face said, "All right girls, get your bikini's on, our first stop on our vacation is my parents time share near the beach!" All the girls around you in the van reacted with a wave of excited yelps and screams. It sounded great to you, and you even began to blush at the idea of spending a few days with a bunch of beautiful girls in bikini's (even if one of them was you and another was your sister). The images in your head suddenly became real a whole lot quicker than you thought as you looked to your left and right and saw that Beth and Jamie and all the girls were changing right there in the van. Even Chelsea had turned on the auto pilot and was changing clothes from behind the wheel.

You were afraid that you were about to turn so red you'd explode when you sister Rachel opened up the bag she packed for you and tossed you a bikini of your own. You look at the skimpy green bikini in your hands and take a gulp before you dive in. You manage to maneuver around and (after 'accidentally' bumping into and rubbing against a few of the girls) you manage to get the bikini on with little issue. And just in time too since as you as you finished Chelsea stopped the van.

Everyone got out of the van at the beach, but you were a little confused. Around was miles and miles of beautiful beach, but nothing else, no homes, no stores, not even a tent was to be seen. "Um, Chelsea, where exactly is this time share of yours?"

Chelsea looked a bit confused by your question and then smiled, "I forgot you'd never been there before Mika. Just get your shot from Jamie follow our lead."

You were about to ask a follow up when you heard Jamie's soothing voice from behind you, "Now this might sting a bit." And as soon as she said it, you felt a small prick on your shapely bottom. "Eep!" You yelp as you rub the spot. You turn and see that one by on Jamie is giving all the girls a shot of some green liquid in the rear. You felt odd, but you had no idea what that shot had just done or was doing to you. Out of curiosity you kept trying to turn your head to get a look at your back to see if you were growing a tail or something, but as you were trying to look at your own ass, you heard Violet scream out to you, "Hurry up Mika!" Rachel followed up by screaming, "Quick! Get to the water before it's too late!"

You looked up and was a bit put off to see all the girls sprinting to the ocean you were about to ask why when you suddenly figured out why when you saw your legs. Your legs were no longs the silky smooth, but had rough green fish like scales that were getting more fish like by the second. Panicking you sprint to ocean as fast as you can, but when you were about 50 feet away you felt your ankles bond together and you stumbled. Looking down it fully clicked, "They turned me into a mermaid?" You said, before quickly getting back to your goal of making it to the water. You try your best to drag yourself through the sand with your hands and flailed your new tail about uselessly, you felt like you were about to pass out from the sun that felt like it was beating down on you ten times more than it ever had, you could hear the girls encouraging you from the ocean. Will they be able to will you on? Or will Micheal be left on the beach as a mermaid until someone finds him?
1111322111211111121.title: They're going to a beachside resort

choices: You draw the Mother card
You draw the Son card, you're busted
11113221112111112.content:
All the girls seemed to be excited when they saw Rachel was reaching for the shrink ray. "Looks like we're spending a night playing house in the dollhouse again." Chelsea said. Rachel saw you looking confused and said, "When we shrink down and spend the night in the dollhouse we tend to get into some roll playing aspects. We'll use some of Jamie stuff to make it so we're a nice happy family with father, mother, son, daughter, and family pet." Paulina added, "I think we should add a baby to the mix with 6 of us now." "That sounds good," Rachel said grabbing scraps of paper, wrote some stuff down, and put it all in a hat.

Jamie drew from the hat first and drew the Father. Jamie smiled and grabbed a sex change nanite injector like Rachel had used on you earlier, and also downed a red pill. Jamie explained to you she had some temporary age progression and age reduction pills. They last for a few hours so you'll be your proper age in a few hours. In a matter of minutes instead of the beautiful Jamie, stood a very handsome dark haired man probably in his early 30s.

Beth went next and drew the baby. She seemed disappointed by this, but didn't complain as she downed a couple of blue pills. Before your eyes Beth went from being a teenager to an adolescent, to a kid, to a baby before your eyes. Paulina was next and got the daughter, she decided she wanted to be a little younger and took a single blue pill and regressed into about a 8 year old. Violet drew next and got the family pet. She seemed really happy about this. Her transformation was a little more complicated. She got her face wrapped in what looked like a hot towel, but you guessed it just made her face more malleable because when it came off her face was the shape of a dog, she did the same to her limbs so she seemed to have dog legs. She then got a bottle sprayed on her that made her grow fur. Purple fur, but fur nevertheless. It took a bit, but soon she looked like your average purple dog.

Harris couldn't help but look away and chuckle, before focusing back on you and then leaning forward, putting his hands on the table and collapsing them together.

"Listen Craig, I'm not an idiot. I can see that you weren't the most enthusiastic person around when you got the less menial jobs. Unfortunately, I didn't have a choice in the matter. All those working at the Velusian Investigative Branch has to be working at least a year before they are eligible for higher profile jobs," he explained.

You realized that this was a great opportunity, but...the job seemed a bit bigger and more investing than anything you've done before...and this would be your first high profile investigation?

"I guess, I'm a little unsure why such a long and invested case is being given to me as my first high profile job?" you asked.

Harris scratched the back of his head, looked down, and then sighed. "I'll be honest here Craig. Truthfully, nobody wanted this job for the exact reasons you specified. A lot of our agents would much rather seduce them quickly and then get their evidence or truth."

You took another deep breath. "So...basically, I got the bottom of the barrel, right?"

Harris chuckled. "I wouldn't call it the bottom. Have you seen this guy? Look at the notes!"

You frowned, but opened the portfolio and checked the notes. You saw a photo of Darson while walking to work. Just based on appearance, he certainly was handsome, but almost everyone in Velusian was. He was of average build, brown curly hair that was neatly cut, and a slightly chiseled face.

You could get a more detailed description in the notes, but you knew that in general, there wasn't anything special of this guy apart from others.

Seeing your raised indifferent eyes, Harris chuckled and then raised his hands in defense. "Okay, sorry! I know that doesn't particularly matter anymore in this day and age. What's important is that this is a chance to prove to yourself. You're the best candidate here, Craig. Your single, clear of any debt, and haven't made any obligation. You have more time than anyone else here!"

Although it was a higher level case that may prove interesting, you were still unsure of the time that had to be invested. What your boss did say was true, you could do it without any worry.

"If you decide not to do it, I can't promise there will be a case that interests you until you clear-"

"I'll do it."

Harris was surprised as you accepted the case. Seeing your serious expression, he couldn't help but slowly smile. Standing up from his desk, he patted your arm and laughed, glad he got someone to finally accept the case. You had a feeling he would never hear the end of it from his boss if he didn't get anyone to work on it.

"So...this is a high profile case?" you asked. You realized looking upon the notes that there was no assigned priority.

Harris blinked, almost forgetting about the level. "Oh right...well, since we don't know how much threat this guy is in and the parties that are involved within the company, it could be nothing or very dangerous. Some of these higher authorities in this company...have a dangerous eye to them."

Looking back at the notes, you saw the company was Datatron Inc. Certainly a big company...the kind that you are a nobody as soon as you are hired and easily replaceable. You had to wonder what caused Darson to want to apply there. There were a lot of better and more secure jobs elsewhere dealing with data information.

Well, that was simply part of your investigation. Taking a deep breath, you had to prepare your mind. You would be staying as a woman for who knows how long. Although you were trained to be able to handle numerous transformation, applying them was a different story.

"So...what's his type?"

Harris chuckled. "Well, unfortunately, we don't know. He has never dated anyone."

You paused and realized how horrible this was going to be for Harris. Looking at Harris incredulously, you curled your lips in guilt.

"Your telling me I'm going to be his...first? That's a bit...evil, don't you think?" you asked.

Harris waved dismissively. "I don't think you need to be overly conscious about it. Just give him a good time until you find evidence of a party trying to rob him, and then leave him. Nobody in Velusian ends up with one partner for the rest of their life."

"That's true, I suppose," you admitted, before putting the portfolio down, "Alright, when do I start?"

Harris clapped his hands and then got up, opening the door way out of his office. Leaning forward and presenting a hand towards outside like a gentleman, he grinned.

"Right now...my dear lady," he stated, ready to move to the transformation chamber.

You rolled your eyes, but otherwise, you were excited to go through your first transformation in a case. You went through it before, but it was only in training and adjustment. Every transformation was unique resulting in a person that is guaranteed not to look like anyone else in Velusian. To bar people from copying, transformative hospitals were barred from transforming others into people that looked like anyone currently or previously transformed on duty. You were a bit confused as to what kind of person you would turn into. If they didn't know Daron's type, how would they know what kind of person to transform you into? Perhaps it was just randomized.

After changing, you flipped your hair back and walked out of the chamber. You were immediately met with Harris and a couple of other operators in lab coats. The lab coats opened their mouth in awe while Harris whistled.

What a horrible man.

The operators couldn't help but smile gleefully. "Actually, we truthfully just wanted to see if could adjust the height. Since this is the first time in a while where we don't have a specified criteria, we figured it was okay to experiment a little."

You stared at the operators dumbfounded. They made you taller just because they could?

Looking at Harris, it appeared he didn't mind either. Remaining calm, you narrowed your eyes.

"What if I found out he doesn't like tall women?"

Harris, once again, brushed off your concerns. "Then just come back here and we'll transform you into a female of average height. Truth be told, not liking you just because of your height would be pure stupidity on his part."

Sighing, you were a little disappointed how laid back everyone was. Nobody wanted this case and the level of priority was unknown, so nobody was concerned on the details.

"Anyways, why don't you take a look in the bathroom to see the new you and come back into my office. We'll discuss how you'll proceed with this case," Harris suggested, the perverted smile on his face never leaving.

"S-sure," you answered, warily. Leaving the company of your boss and operator as you stepped into the nearest bathroom. Due to the frequency of transformation, there was no separated bathroom for male or females, but you knew you had to be conscious when you were in public.

Coming out of the bathroom, you weren't surprised to find that you were very beautiful with your brown eyes, photogenic face, and slender body. You were practically a model...well, everyone was in their own way.

Entering the store, you noted how you were scanned at the door by a automated, shielded machine at the top of the door. No stopping was required as you kept moving.

Once in, you looked around for the women's clothing section. As you surveyed your surroundings, you saw that several people started to notice you as your height stood out.

How troublesome. As an undercover agent, you were supposed to blend in. Although it wasn't that important since your objective concerned only one person, to be stared at was a little annoying.

Ignoring the stares, you found the section and began your shopping. It was going to be a long day.

-*-*-*-


One of the employees around the woman's section came up to you to ask if you needed any help. She looked about 24 years old, blond hair, blue eyes, a bit of a round, baby face. Unlike you or even the most average girl, she seemed to be even shorter than normal, around 5'2".

"Wow, you're really tall miss. Do you need any assistance?" she asked, unable to help but state the obvious.

You provided a reassuring smile. "Oh no, I'm fine."

"Oh, well okay. It looked like you were in a hurry, but have problems picking out clothes. If you need any assistance, please let me know," she reminded.

Giving another smile, you showed a little shame. "Perhaps...some help would be appreciated."

The employee slowly gasped, beaming with excitement at the chance to actually help someone. You wondered if you had made a mistake, but it looked like there was no turning back now.

Aware of her public display of excitement, she tried to calm down and showed an embarrassed smile.

"I'm sorry. Truthfully, this is my first day, but its been so boring. Everyone seems content on picking out clothes without a second opinion. My name's Chelsea," she greeted, extending out her hand.

You forced a small chuckle as you reassured her. "It's no problem. I'm Jasmine."

Atmosphere generators can fail, causing the air to become unbreathable, or weather manipulators can malfunction, turning a tropical paradise world into a never ending cyclone storm. Worlds can flash freeze, or be incinerated, or have their atmosphere stripped away by the gravity well of a passing planet.

Biospheres are also prone to malfunction, especially in the first decade, before the flora and fauna eventually finds a natural equilibrium. This is primarily due to the extensive modifications performed to the organisms to allow them to survive and thrive. If left to run amok, a single dominant lifeform might breed every other creature out of existence in just a few years.

15523.content:
You've been working almost non-stop at the company for the last few months, eating and sleeping in your office while monitoring the rollout of the new nanites personally. It's been so long away from home that you're fairly sure your wife has filed a divorce in your absence. You've earned a break.

Of course the CEO of a multiplanetary company doesn't just take a month off, even when sales are doing well. Investors don't like it, and shares plummet. You inform the board of directors of your plans. They arrange for a stand-in to cover for you. A professional impersonator modified with your appearance and voice and trained in your mannerisms who will sit in your office and at meetings, and give the occasional press release so as to maintain the image that business is as usual.

With one last satisfied glance at the nightly report, you set off on a much earned break, slipping out of the back entrance while your stand-in arrives. Your chauffeur drives you to the space port, and you catch a private shuttle to Westworld.

Westworld is named not after the archaic movie about a robot-staffed theme park (although such places do exist), but because the entire population is nomadic, constantly moving towards the West. While a fertile planet, it's rotation is extremely slow, such that it takes 7 standard Velusian years to complete a single day-night cycle. The planet is quite the agricultural food bowl of the system and massive cattle drives move ceaselessly from East-to-West, racing ahead of the night.

It was on this planet where the unfortunate misuse of your company's nanites took place. A number of visitors had been converted into cattle and subsequently lost among the other lifestock (an easy thing to happen with herds often numbering in the hundreds of thousands). They had then, unfortunately, been led to slaughter off-world and butchered. The mistake was only noticed once their flesh (still laden with nanites) entered the food chain, with many steakhouses reporting customers suddenly transforming into cows at their tables.

Although every measure has since been taken to ensure such things won't happen again, it is probably inevitable. Many people use Westworld recreationally to get away from their stressful human lives, and the planet still serves thousand of visitors who want nothing more than to be one with the herd, to become a cow or a bull and enjoy the steady plod-plod towards the horizon, to be one of the hard-worked but valued horses ridden by the gauchos, or one of the dogs that barks and nips at the heels of the stragglers. Such a life is simple but can be fulfilling for a time.
